main event: A sighting of a very large spherical object with distinct grey bands was reported in Saginaw, Michigan on March 27, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 1 minute and 15 seconds., The object was described as having a burnt orange color and being the size of a basketball., There were reports of the object drifting from the bottom up., The possible identities of the object include a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., The sighting took place at dawn with clear weather conditions.
sighted object: very large spherical object with grey bands
